summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 29 and 30, Carleton Park Addition, and in Block 5, Briancliff Addition No. 2, being the alley in block bounded by 42nd Avenue West, West Viewmont Way, and West Armour Street, and certain other alleys and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 77916, creating Local Improvement District No. 5903, and amending Section 2 of said ordinance.
